about.title: About the Conference
about.description: Welcome to our prestigious conference that brings together researchers, academicians, and industry professionals from around the globe. This event serves as a platform for sharing cutting-edge research, fostering collaborations, and discussing the latest developments in the field.
about.mission: To facilitate the exchange of innovative ideas and research findings, promoting academic excellence and industry-academia collaboration.
about.vision: To become a leading platform for knowledge sharing and research dissemination in the field, contributing to global scientific advancement.

tracks.title: Conference Tracks
tracks.description: Our conference covers various tracks in the field of research and development.

trackList.name: Artificial Intelligence
trackList.description: Research in AI and Machine Learning
